page.title: 02People survey
page.content: Questionnaire to 260 households. Response rate 147. Findings: {Housing}89.7% owner occupiers. 7.5% council tenants. Semi-detached 38.7%. Terraced 11.5% Detached 41%. {Population}social class: upper middle 34.7%,lower middle 21.2%,upper working 36.1%, lower working 7.8%. Social mobility 54.6% in a higher social class than father.10.1% in a lower class.35.1% remained in same group. 69.3% were born in local area (less than 20 miles). 48.2% had lived in area 0-10 years.48.2% for 10-20 years. {Employment }18.9% worked in immediate area. 64.5% in 4 nearest towns. 22.8% in other areas. Unemployed 5%. 82.3% of mothers worked. {Homelife}41.4% saw other relatives more than once a week.29.2% saw relatives once a week.
